actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ostrich makes two kicking claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The ostrich can jump horizontally up to 20 feet and vertically up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

special_abilities.name: Battle Leaper
special_abilities.desc: If a riderless ostrich jumps at least 10 feet and lands within 5 feet of a creature, it has advantage on attacks against that creature this turn.
